overview: Anthony E. Braddy founded CMC, LLC in 2008, with over 10 years experience in the Information Technology industry. Having held positions of responsibility and accountability in all software development and project/program management, his vision was to create an organization that helped their clients improve overall efficiency and effectiveness by leveraging process improvements combined with innovative usage of new and existing technologies. In addition to being the lead architect for business process reengineering projects, Anthony leads the charge in securing new business opportunities and key corporate decisions.

degrees.institution: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

milestones.description:
"Best of Business Award" in the management 
consulting services category by the 
Small Business Commerce Association (2009)
milestones.source_description: Capital Management Consulting, LLC Receives 2009 Best of Business Award
